name: Virtual Universe
description:
Virtual Universe - Version 2.2 released!

Language: English

Discover all 8 planets of our solar system with an upgradeable rocket. Survive the meteorite impacts and collect resources to improve the rocket for further flights to more distant planets.

Have fun!

Please sent bug reports in comment section.

Known Bugs:

-Instuction Menu not fully visible when screen resolution is lower than 1920x1080

-Sometimes inventory slots only accessible with number keys - not with mouse-click
